{{Navbox | name = Nature | state = {{{state<includeonly>|{{{1|autocollapse}}}</includeonly>}}} | bodyclass = hlist | title = Elements of [[nature]]
| group1 = [[Universe]] | list1 = * [[Space]] * [[Time]] * [[Energy]] * [[Matter]] **[[Particle|particles]] **[[Chemical element|chemical elements]] * [[Mathematics#Change|Change]]
| group2 = [[Earth]] | list2 = * [[Earth science]] * [[History of Earth|History]] ([[Geological history of Earth|geological]]) * [[Structure of the Earth|Structure]] * [[Geology]] * [[Plate tectonics]] * [[Ocean]]s * [[Gaia hypothesis]] * [[Future of Earth|Future]]
| group3 = [[Weather]] | list3 = * [[Meteorology]] <!--(Alphabetical:)--> * [[Atmosphere of Earth|Atmosphere {{smaller|(Earth)}}]] * [[Climate]] * [[Cloud]]s * [[Rain]] * [[Snow]] * [[Sunlight]] * [[Tide]]s * [[Wind]] **[[tornado]] **[[tropical cyclone]]
| group4 = [[Natural environment]] | list4 = * [[Ecology]] * [[Ecosystem]] * [[Field (physics)|Field]] * [[Radiation]] * [[Wilderness]] * [[Wildfire]]s
| group5 = [[Life]] | list5 = {{Navbox |child |groupstyle=text-align:center; | list1 = * [[Abiogenesis|Origin {{smaller|(abiogenesis)}}]] * [[Evolutionary history of life|Evolutionary history]] * [[Biosphere]] * [[Biological organisation|Hierarchy]] * [[Biology]] ([[Astrobiology|astrobiology]])
| list2 = * [[Biodiversity]] * [[Organism]] * [[Eukaryote|Eukaryota]] <!--Lowercase (sublists):--> ** [[flora]] *** [[plant]]s ** [[fauna]] *** [[animal]]s ** [[Fungus|fungi]] ** [[protist]]a * [[Prokaryote]]s ** [[archaea]] ** [[bacteria]] * ''[[Virus]]es''<!--(italics as not universally considered to be alive)--> }}
| below = * {{icon|Category}} [[:Category:Nature|Category]]
}}<noinclude> {{Documentation | content = {{Collapsible option |statename=optional}} [[Category:Science and nature templates]] [[Category:Environment navigational boxes]] }}<!--(end Documentation)--> </noinclude>
